column5: Relaxing game that's great for the imagination and creativity.
Single player experience was great, multiplayer not so much.
Movie tie-in game. It was crap.
Buggie experience but a lot to do in the world
Great level design, interesting main character
The way sonic was meant to be played, 2D and fast paced
Interesting platformer, more fun to play with friends.
